trans-unit.source: Enforces and catches exceptions that are thrown in a data model and displays the error.
trans-unit.target: 强制实施和捕获的数据模型中引发的异常并显示错误。

trans-unit.source: The DynamicValidator control can be used with data fields or data entities.
trans-unit.target: 可以与数据字段或数据实体使用 DynamicValidator 控件。

trans-unit.source: It catches exceptions that are thrown in LINQ-to-SQL classes or entity in extensibility methods in the data model.
trans-unit.target: 它捕获 LINQ SQL 类或数据模型中的扩展方法中的实体中引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The DynamicValidator control is associated with the controls that accept user input.
trans-unit.target: DynamicValidator 控件都接受用户输入的控件相关联。

trans-unit.source: For example, a DynamicValidator control that is associated with a text box that accepts user input for a UnitsInStock field in a Products table catches and displays the exception that is thrown if the input is greater or less than the allowable units in the data model.
trans-unit.target: 例如，与一个接受用户输入的产品表中的库存量字段的文本框关联的 DynamicValidator 控件捕获并显示如果输入是大于或小于数据模型中的允许单元引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Dynamic Data does not display all exceptions from the data model in the page, because some database exceptions might contain confidential information.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 动态数据不显示数据模型中的所有异常在页中，因为某些数据库异常可能包含机密信息。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic Data displays <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidator.ValidationException%2A> values only.
trans-unit.target: 动态数据显示<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidator.ValidationException%2A>值。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidator.ValidationException%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want your application to display other exceptions, you can create a DynamicValidator control, provide the exceptions that you want to display, and attach the exceptions to the DynamicValidator control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望您的应用程序，以显示其他异常，你可以创建 DynamicValidator 控件，提供你想要显示，异常并附加到 DynamicValidator 控件的异常。

trans-unit.source: The exceptions that are thrown in the data model will be displayed in all pages in the application.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序中的所有页中，将显示在数据模型中引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column to validate.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要验证的列。

trans-unit.source: The column to validate, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a data entity is validated.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证，列或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果验证的数据实体。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the column to validate.
trans-unit.target: 获取要验证的列的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the column to validate, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a data entity is validated.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证，列的名称或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果验证的数据实体。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the properties of the specified <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidator"></xref> control are valid.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否指定的属性<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidator"></xref>控件是否有效。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden from the base class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法被重写从基类。

trans-unit.source: The call to the base class fails if the control you try to validate does not have a validation property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试验证控件不具有验证属性，对基类的调用将失败。

trans-unit.source: For example if the control is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, the base class will fail.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果控件是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>，基类将失败。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the properties of the specified validation control are valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>指定的验证控件的属性是否有效，则为否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value in the input control to validate is valid.
trans-unit.target: 确定要验证的输入控件中的值是否有效。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation control that is evaluated is valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果计算的验证控件是有效，则为否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Init" name="Init" href=""></xref> event to initialize the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref uid="langword_csharp_Init" name="Init" href=""></xref>事件初始化<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidator"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Sets up a validation exception if an exception occurs in the data model.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据模型中发生异常，则将设置验证异常。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 引发异常时调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: A column-specific validator fails when a validation exception contains an associated inner exception, but a global validator fail when a non-validation exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: 特定于列的验证程序失败时验证异常包含关联的内部异常，但全局验证程序失败时则会发生非验证异常。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Only use this method if the exception is a <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidator.ValidationException%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 才能使用此方法，如果异常是一种<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidator.ValidationException%2A>。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidator.ValidationException%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the exception is caused by a database error, using this method can display a sensitive database error
trans-unit.target: 如果异常由于数据库错误，使用此方法可以显示敏感数据库错误

trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets validation exception that occurs during validation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置验证过程中发生的验证异常。

trans-unit.source: This property represents the validation exception that is thrown if an error occurs when a value is edited or when a new value is inserted into the data model.
trans-unit.target: 此属性表示如果编辑值时出现错误，或者新值插入到数据模型时将引发验证异常。

trans-unit.source: The validation exception that is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 将引发验证异常。
